natal_chart.planets_description: Each planet represents an archetype, an inner voice within you. The outer planets show generational energies and deep transformation potential.
natal_chart.houses_description: The twelve houses represent twelve sacred areas of life. Each house is like a temple - with its own rituals, lessons, and treasures.
natal_chart.aspects_description: Aspects show how different energies within you relate to each other. Trines indicate natural talents, squares show growth opportunities, oppositions point to polarizations that need balancing.
natal_chart.retrograde_description: Retrograde planets turn that planet's energy inward. During these periods, it's beneficial to direct that energy toward inner motivation.

numerology.title: What do numbers tell you?
numerology.destiny_number_desc: Calculated from the total value of your name, this number reveals your main purpose and potential in life.
numerology.shadow_side_footer: These aspects can be transformed with awareness. Accepting the shadow is not empowering it - it is integrating it.
numerology.karmic_debt_message: Your chart has {debts} karmic debt. Tap for details.
numerology.ancient_secret_desc: Numerology is an ancient wisdom where the universe speaks in a mathematical language. From Pythagoras to Kabbalah, all esoteric traditions knew the power of numbers. Your birth date and name carry the vibration your soul brought into this world. Each number is a frequency, an energy, a destiny. What you see here is not coincidence - it is the code of your soul.
numerology.kadim_content: Since Pythagoras, sages have known that numbers carry the hidden language of the universe. Your life path number is not just a digit - it is the vibration your soul brought into this world, the unique melody the universe gave you. To hear this melody, you first need silence.
numerology.karmic_13_desc: A karmic debt arising from laziness and irresponsibility. Must be balanced through hard work and discipline in this life.
numerology.karmic_14_desc: A debt from misusing freedom. Learning responsibility and moderation is required in this life.
numerology.karmic_16_desc: A debt from ego and relationship issues. Requires humility and inner transformation.
numerology.karmic_19_desc: A debt from misusing power and authority. Learning the balance of independence and helping others is required.
numerology.karmic_default_desc: This number carries a karmic debt and requires certain lessons to be learned in this life.

reiki.title: Reiki
reiki.subtitle: Universal Life Energy
reiki.description: Reiki means 'universal life energy' in Japanese. This energy flowing through the hands activates the body's natural healing mechanisms and dissolves energy blocks. It provides stress reduction, relaxation, and holistic healing.

kyo_dake_wa.description: Focus on the present moment. The past is gone, the future hasn't come yet. You can only control today.

ikaru_na.description: Anger depletes your energy and harms your health. Accept your emotions but let them go.

shinpai_suna.description: Worry is giving energy to things that haven't happened. Live with trust and surrender.

kansha_shite.description: Gratitude is one of the highest vibrations. Find a blessing in everything.

gyo_wo_hageme.description: Whatever work you do, do it with integrity and dedication. Add meaning to your life.

hito_ni_shinsetsu_ni.description: Compassion and kindness are universal healing energies. Be kind to everyone, including yourself.

self_reiki.title: Self-Reiki Practice
steps: Sit or lie in a comfortable position
Close your eyes and take several deep breaths
Set your intention: "I open myself to healing energy"
Place hands on top of your head (3-5 min)
Place hands over your eyes (3-5 min)
Place hands on your throat (3-5 min)
Place hands on your heart (3-5 min)
Place hands on solar plexus (3-5 min)
Place hands below navel (3-5 min)
Finish with gratitude

daily_cleansing.title: Daily Energy Cleansing
steps: Rub your hands together when you wake up
Feel your hands warming and energy flowing
Cleanse your energy field by moving hands around your aura
Release negative energy into the ground
Start the day with positive intentions

distance_reiki.title: Distance Reiki
steps: Get permission from the person you'll send healing to (mentally)
Visualize the person or situation
Draw the Hon Sha Ze Sho Nen symbol (if applicable)
Send love and healing intention
Feel the energy reaching them
Finish with gratitude

reiki.tip: Working with a Reiki master is recommended for Reiki attunement. These practices can help develop energy awareness even if you haven't been attuned.

houses.title: Astrological Houses
houses.subtitle: 12 astrological houses and life areas
houses.section_subtitle: Discover different areas of your life
houses.view_house_on_chart: View This House on My Chart

1.title: 1st House - House of Self
1.description: Represents your personality, physical appearance and how you present yourself to the world. The rising sign rules this house.

2.title: 2nd House - House of Money & Values
2.description: Represents your material values, ability to earn money and self-worth.

3.title: 3rd House - House of Communication
3.description: Represents your thinking style, communication skills and relationships with your close environment.

4.title: 4th House - House of Family & Roots
4.description: Represents your family, home, emotional foundations and the later period of your life.

5.title: 5th House - House of Creativity & Love
5.description: Represents your creative expression, romance, children and sense of entertainment.

6.title: 6th House - House of Health & Service
6.description: Represents your daily routines, work habits and physical health.

7.title: 7th House - House of Marriage & Partnership
7.description: Represents your serious relationships, marriage and all types of partnerships.

8.title: 8th House - House of Transformation
8.description: Represents deep transformation, shared resources, sexuality and spiritual rebirth.

9.title: 9th House - House of Philosophy & Travel
9.description: Represents higher education, long journeys, philosophy and spiritual quest.

10.title: 10th House - House of Career & Status
10.description: Represents your career, social status, goals and achievements.

11.title: 11th House - House of Friends & Ideals
11.description: Represents your friendships, social groups, future hopes and ideals.

12.title: 12th House - House of Subconscious & Secrets
12.description: Represents your subconscious, hidden enemies, spiritual journey and karmic lessons.

houses.birth_time_required_desc: Accurate birth time is needed to calculate house positions
houses.no_planets_info: No planets in this house - this doesn't mean this area is inactive. The sign ruling this house and its ruler planet show how this area operates in your life.

1.title: Gate of Self
1.description: The first house is your soul's first touch to this world - the first breath, the first glance, the first sense of 'I'. This house is your 'cosmic mask'; it shows how your soul chooses to present itself to the world. {signName} here as rising colors your approach to life, your physical appearance and how others first perceive you.
1.shadow: Shadow aspect: Hiding behind the mask, placing excessive importance on appearance.
1.gift: Gift: The ability to experience every moment as a new beginning.

2.title: Temple of Values
2.description: The second house is the sacred temple of the material world. Money is not just paper - it's a reflection of your value system. {signName} positioned in this house shapes your earning style, what you value and your need for security. This house carries the spiritual dimension of the verb 'to possess'.
2.shadow: Shadow aspect: Seeking security only in material things, greed or excessive thriftiness.
2.gift: Gift: Developing abundance consciousness and using resources wisely.

3.title: Garden of the Mind
3.description: The third house is the sacred space of mind and communication. {signName} here determines your thinking style, speaking manner and way of learning. This house also governs relationships with siblings, neighbors and close environment. Here the mind becomes either a garden or a forest - the seeds you plant grow.
3.shadow: Shadow aspect: Superficiality, gossip, scattered attention.
3.gift: Gift: The power to unite worlds through words.

4.title: Root of the Soul
4.description: The fourth house is the deepest point of the chart - the root of your soul. {signName} here shapes family patterns, the need for emotional security and the concept of 'home'. This house carries the legacy of ancestors and the oldest impressions in your subconscious. You cannot understand where you're going without knowing where you came from.
4.shadow: Shadow aspect: Getting stuck in the past, blindly repeating family patterns.
4.gift: Gift: Deep emotional wisdom and capacity for inner peace.

5.title: Creator's Stage
5.description: The fifth house is the stage where your soul finds creative expression. {signName} here colors your creativity style, romantic expression, relationship with children and approach to 'play'. This house is where the joy of the heart springs forth - the home of the child within.
5.shadow: Shadow aspect: Ego inflation, attention addiction, risky behaviors.
5.gift: Gift: Pure creative energy and the ability to inspire others.

6.title: Workshop of Service
6.description: The sixth house is the home of daily life's sacred rituals. {signName} here determines work routines, health habits and approach to service. This house carries the answer to 'how do I serve?' Your body is a temple - the sixth house is its care manual.
6.shadow: Shadow aspect: Obsessive perfectionism, serving others while neglecting yourself.
6.gift: Gift: The capacity to create order and healing.

7.title: Beyond the Mirror
7.description: The seventh house is the mirror of the 'other' - the home of relationships, partnerships and marriage. {signName} here shapes the qualities you seek in partners, your relationship style and the concept of 'we'. Everyone who appears before you reflects something inside you - this house is that mirror.
7.shadow: Shadow aspect: Defining yourself through relationships, codependent relationships.
7.gift: Gift: Creating deep connections and seeing yourself in others.

8.title: Well of Transformation
8.description: The eighth house is the home of the death-rebirth cycle - the place of deepest transformations. {signName} here determines your coping style with crises, shared resources, sexuality and approach to mysteries. This house requires the courage to face shadows.
8.shadow: Shadow aspect: Control obsession, manipulation, fear of loss.
8.gift: Gift: The power to rise again from every pile of ashes like a phoenix.

9.title: Quest for Truth
9.description: The ninth house is the home of the search for meaning - philosophy, higher education, distant journeys and spiritual expansion. {signName} here shapes your belief system, teaching/learning style and way of seeing the 'big picture'. This house pursues the question 'why?'
9.shadow: Shadow aspect: Dogmatism, blind faith, inability to stay in place.
9.gift: Gift: Distilling wisdom from experience and enlightening others.

10.title: Crown of the Peak
10.description: The tenth house is the zenith of the chart - the home of career, social status and life mission. {signName} here determines the mark you want to leave in the world, your career style and relationship with authority figures. This house is the answer to 'who do I want to be in the world?'
10.shadow: Shadow aspect: Status obsession, workaholism, sacrifice for success.
10.gift: Gift: The capacity to leave a lasting and meaningful mark in the world.

11.title: Collective of Dreams
11.description: The eleventh house is the home of collective dreams, ideals and friendships. {signName} here shapes your social circle, group dynamics and vision for the future. This house is about finding your 'tribe' - what you cannot change alone, you transform together.
11.shadow: Shadow aspect: Losing individuality for group conformity, utopian dreams.
11.gift: Gift: Maintaining individual uniqueness while serving the collective good.

12.title: Gateway to Infinity
12.description: The twelfth house is the most mysterious corner of the chart - the home of the subconscious, spirituality, karma and dissolution. {signName} here carries subconscious patterns, your spiritual journey and 'letting go' lessons. This house is the gateway beyond ego, to infinity.
12.shadow: Shadow aspect: Tendency to escape, victim role, disconnection from reality.
12.gift: Gift: Boundless compassion and the experience of universal unity.

sign_summaries.gemini: Les [[G√©meaux]] repr√©sentent la communication et l'intelligence avec l'√©nergie [[Mutable]] d'[[Air]]. Sous la domination de [[Mercure]], l'apprentissage et le partage des connaissances sont vitaux.

falling.short_answer_1: Falling dreams usually reflect a feeling of loss of control.
falling.short_answer_2: They appear when we feel like things are slipping away from us.
falling.short_answer_3: Waking up while falling is your subconscious's reflex to wake you.
falling.meaning_1: More common during times of uncertainty.
falling.meaning_2: You might be worried about work, relationships, or health.
falling.meaning_3: The speed of the fall shows the intensity of anxiety.
falling.recurring_2: Look at what makes you feel unstable in life.
falling.recurring_3: Accepting what you cannot control can bring relief.

water.short_answer_1: Water symbolizes the subconscious and emotions.
water.short_answer_2: The state of water reflects your inner world.
water.short_answer_3: Calm water shows peace, turbulent water shows turmoil.
water.state_title: What Does the Water's State Tell You?
water.state_1: Clear water: Mental clarity and emotional balance.
water.state_2: Murky water: Uncertainty or suppressed emotions.
water.state_3: Flowing water: Harmony with life's flow.
water.state_4: Still water: Time for introspection and reflection.
water.emotion_1: Swimming: Being at peace with emotions.
water.emotion_2: Falling into water: Emotions taking control.
water.recurring_1: You're trying to process an emotional issue.
water.recurring_2: There may be a need for inner cleansing.
water.recurring_3: You're learning to trust your intuition more.

flying.short_answer_1: Flying dreams reflect the desire for freedom and transcending limits.
flying.short_answer_2: Shows you've taken or want to take control.
flying.short_answer_3: The ease of flight symbolizes the flow in your life.
flying.feeling_1: Enjoyable flight: Confidence and sense of success.
flying.feeling_3: Fear of falling: Insecurity or doubt.
flying.meaning_1: Desire to break free from restrictions.
flying.cant_fly_1: You're struggling to believe in yourself.
flying.cant_fly_2: An obstacle is holding you back.
flying.cant_fly_3: It might be time to let go of control.

running.short_answer_1: Running dreams show the desire to escape from a situation or emotion.
running.short_answer_2: There might be something you're avoiding confronting.
running.short_answer_3: Being caught while running makes you feel escape isn't working.
running.meaning_1: There's a challenging situation in your life.
running.meaning_2: You might be running from responsibility or conflict.
running.meaning_3: What you're running from is usually within yourself.
running.from_1: From someone familiar: Unresolved issue with that person.
running.from_2: From a monster: Your own fears.
running.from_3: From vague danger: General state of anxiety.
running.recurring_1: There's a decision you've been putting off.
running.recurring_2: It might be time to face rather than run.
running.recurring_3: A dream where the escape ends shows the solution has begun.

lost.short_answer_1: Being lost reflects a feeling of losing direction and uncertainty.
lost.short_answer_2: Shows you don't know where life is taking you.
lost.short_answer_3: Could be a search for identity or purpose.
lost.where_1: City: Lost direction in social life.
lost.where_4: Familiar place: You're questioning what you know.
lost.meaning_1: You're struggling to make a decision.
lost.meaning_2: You feel you've lost control of your life.
lost.meaning_3: You're searching for who you are or what you want.
lost.find_2: Getting help: You're open to accepting support.

losing.short_answer_1: Losing someone dreams usually reflect fear of separation.
losing.short_answer_2: Doesn't have to be a real loss, it's a feeling of losing connection.
losing.short_answer_3: There may be unresolved feelings about that person.
losing.who_1: A loved one: Your attachment and fear of loss.
losing.who_2: A stranger: Your connection to yourself.
losing.who_3: A child: Innocence within or new beginnings.
losing.meaning_1: You might be experiencing fear of change.
losing.meaning_2: You feel distance in a relationship.
losing.recurring_1: Your fear of loss may have deepened.
losing.recurring_2: There's something you need to discuss with that person.
losing.recurring_3: You're seeking balance between independence and attachment.

past.short_answer_1: Someone from the past symbolizes unfinished feelings.
past.short_answer_2: It might be about that era, not that person.
past.short_answer_3: The subconscious is processing an old issue.
past.who_3: Someone who passed: Grief process or longing.
past.who_4: Someone from childhood: Past trauma or nostalgia.
past.meaning_1: The emotion you experienced then is still active.
past.meaning_2: A current situation may have triggered the past.
past.meaning_3: It may be time to forgive or let go.
past.recurring_1: You need to resolve something about that person.
past.recurring_2: The past is affecting the present.
past.recurring_3: Time to separate yourself from that era.

searching.short_answer_1: Searching dreams reflect feelings of lack or loss.
searching.short_answer_2: Shows you're chasing something in life.
searching.short_answer_3: What you're searching for explains what you need.
searching.what_1: An object: A lost trait or ability.
searching.what_2: A person: Need for connection or relationship.
searching.what_3: A place: Search for security or belonging.
searching.what_4: Vague: Search for direction in life.
searching.meaning_2: You're looking for answers but don't know where.
searching.meaning_3: You might be in a period of inner searching.
searching.not_found_1: There's something you're not ready for yet.
searching.not_found_2: What you're looking for might be within you.

darkness.short_answer_1: Darkness symbolizes the unknown and unexplored inner world.
darkness.short_answer_2: There may be emotions or thoughts you're not aware of.
darkness.short_answer_3: Can be read as an invitation to discovery, not fear.
darkness.action_title: What Did You Do in the Dark?
darkness.action_3: Were afraid: You're wary of the unknown.
darkness.action_4: Searched for light: Looking for clarity and meaning.
darkness.meaning_1: You're in an uncertain period in life.
darkness.meaning_2: There are parts of yourself you haven't met.
darkness.meaning_3: You're suppressing a secret or hidden emotion.
darkness.recurring_2: You're being invited on an inner journey.
darkness.recurring_3: Light comes after the darkness passes.

voiceless.short_answer_1: Being voiceless reflects feeling unable to express yourself.
voiceless.why_1: Voice didn't come out: Suppressed emotions.
voiceless.why_3: Screamed but nothing came out: Intense frustration.
voiceless.meaning_2: You can't express yourself on some matter.
voiceless.recurring_1: You're struggling to make your voice heard.
voiceless.recurring_3: There's someone you need to talk to.

unable_to_fly.short_answer_1: Being unable to fly reflects feeling you can't use your potential.
unable_to_fly.short_answer_2: You perceive an obstacle or limitation.
unable_to_fly.short_answer_3: You want freedom but something holds you back.
unable_to_fly.why_2: Fear: You're afraid of success or failure.
unable_to_fly.why_3: Falling: You feel a lack of confidence.
unable_to_fly.why_4: Physical obstacle: External conditions limiting you.
unable_to_fly.meaning_1: You're struggling to believe in yourself.
unable_to_fly.meaning_2: You have a fear of missing an opportunity.
unable_to_fly.meaning_3: You might need to let go of control.
unable_to_fly.recurring_2: Your inner critic is too strong.
unable_to_fly.recurring_3: To learn to fly, you must accept falling.

recurring.short_answer_1: Recurring dreams point to an unresolved issue.
recurring.short_answer_2: The subconscious is trying to get your attention.
recurring.short_answer_3: It repeats until the message is understood.
recurring.why_2: An ongoing source of stress in your life.
recurring.what_to_do_1: Note the dream, record the details.
recurring.what_to_do_3: Think about what in life it might connect to.
recurring.what_to_do_4: Try to consciously address the issue.
recurring.when_stops_2: When you take action on the related matter.
recurring.when_stops_3: When you release the emotional burden.

personality.aries: A natural-born leader with boundless energy and enthusiasm. Your Aries child is adventurous, courageous, and loves to be first at everything.
personality.taurus: A gentle soul who appreciates comfort and stability. Your Taurus child is patient, determined, and has a strong appreciation for beauty.
personality.gemini: A curious mind that never stops asking questions. Your Gemini child is communicative, adaptable, and loves learning new things.
personality.cancer: A sensitive and nurturing spirit. Your Cancer child is intuitive, caring, and deeply connected to family.
personality.leo: A bright star who loves to shine. Your Leo child is confident, creative, and has a natural flair for drama.
personality.virgo: A thoughtful perfectionist with attention to detail. Your Virgo child is helpful, analytical, and loves organizing things.
personality.libra: A natural peacemaker who values harmony. Your Libra child is charming, fair-minded, and loves making friends.
personality.scorpio: An intense and passionate soul. Your Scorpio child is determined, intuitive, and fiercely loyal.
personality.sagittarius: A free spirit with an adventurous heart. Your Sagittarius child is optimistic, honest, and loves exploring.
personality.capricorn: A responsible old soul. Your Capricorn child is ambitious, disciplined, and wise beyond their years.
personality.aquarius: A unique individual who thinks differently. Your Aquarius child is inventive, independent, and humanitarian.
personality.pisces: A dreamy and imaginative spirit. Your Pisces child is compassionate, artistic, and deeply intuitive.

learning_style.aries: Learns best through hands-on activities and competition. Needs variety and challenges to stay engaged.
learning_style.taurus: Learns best with a steady, methodical approach. Needs time to absorb information and appreciate routine.
learning_style.gemini: Learns best through conversation and variety. Needs mental stimulation and diverse topics.
learning_style.cancer: Learns best in a secure, nurturing environment. Needs emotional connection to the material.
learning_style.leo: Learns best when praised and given the spotlight. Needs creative expression and recognition.
learning_style.virgo: Learns best with organized, detailed instruction. Needs clear expectations and practical applications.
learning_style.libra: Learns best through partnership and discussion. Needs balance between subjects and social interaction.
learning_style.scorpio: Learns best through deep investigation. Needs to understand the 'why' behind everything.
learning_style.sagittarius: Learns best through exploration and big-picture thinking. Needs freedom and adventure in learning.
learning_style.capricorn: Learns best with structure and clear goals. Needs to see the practical purpose of knowledge.
learning_style.aquarius: Learns best through unconventional methods. Needs freedom to think independently and innovate.
learning_style.pisces: Learns best through imagination and creativity. Needs artistic outlets and gentle guidance.

social_style.aries: Natural leader among peers, sometimes bossy but always exciting to be around.
social_style.taurus: Loyal friend who values long-term relationships over many acquaintances.
social_style.gemini: Social butterfly who makes friends easily but may have trouble with deep connections.
social_style.cancer: Prefers a small circle of close friends, very protective of loved ones.
social_style.leo: Popular and generous, loves being the center of their friend group.
social_style.virgo: Selective with friendships, helpful and reliable to those they trust.
social_style.libra: Natural diplomat who brings harmony to groups and dislikes conflict.
social_style.scorpio: Intense in friendships, prefers quality over quantity in relationships.
social_style.sagittarius: Friendly and open, makes friends from all backgrounds easily.
social_style.capricorn: Mature in social settings, often befriends older children or adults.
social_style.aquarius: Friendly but independent, values uniqueness in themselves and friends.
social_style.pisces: Empathetic friend who absorbs others' emotions, needs alone time to recharge.

emotional_needs.aries: Needs encouragement for their initiatives and space to be independent.
emotional_needs.taurus: Needs physical comfort, routine, and reassurance of stability.
emotional_needs.gemini: Needs mental stimulation and freedom to express their thoughts.
emotional_needs.cancer: Needs emotional security, family time, and a cozy home environment.
emotional_needs.leo: Needs appreciation, attention, and opportunities to express creativity.
emotional_needs.virgo: Needs order, purpose, and gentle encouragement without harsh criticism.
emotional_needs.libra: Needs harmony, fairness, and help making decisions.
emotional_needs.scorpio: Needs trust, privacy, and deep emotional connections.
emotional_needs.sagittarius: Needs freedom, adventure, and honest communication.
emotional_needs.capricorn: Needs respect, responsibility, and recognition of achievements.
emotional_needs.aquarius: Needs acceptance of their uniqueness and intellectual freedom.
emotional_needs.pisces: Needs understanding, creative outlets, and protection from harsh realities.

parenting_tips.aries: Channel their energy into sports and activities. Give them leadership opportunities and praise their courage.
parenting_tips.taurus: Provide stability and routine. Give them time to adjust to changes and appreciate their patience.
parenting_tips.gemini: Keep them mentally stimulated with books and conversations. Be patient with their changing interests.
parenting_tips.cancer: Create a secure home environment. Honor their emotions and maintain family traditions.
parenting_tips.leo: Give them opportunities to shine and be creative. Praise their efforts while teaching humility.
parenting_tips.virgo: Be gentle with criticism. Help them see the big picture and not get lost in details.
parenting_tips.libra: Help them make decisions by limiting choices. Teach them it's okay to have opinions.
parenting_tips.scorpio: Respect their privacy and emotional depth. Build trust through honesty and consistency.
parenting_tips.sagittarius: Give them freedom within boundaries. Encourage their curiosity and love of learning.
parenting_tips.capricorn: Recognize their achievements and let them have fun. Don't put too much pressure on them.
parenting_tips.aquarius: Accept their uniqueness and encourage their ideas. Give them space to be independent.
parenting_tips.pisces: Protect their sensitivity while building resilience. Encourage their creativity and imagination.

tarot.title: Que vous disent les cartes?
tarot.ancient_wisdom_title: Les Cles de la Sagesse Ancienne
tarot.ancient_wisdom_intro: Le Tarot est un miroir du subconscient. Ces cartes ne montrent pas l'avenir, mais les possibilites. Chaque tirage revele le champ energetique actuel et les chemins potentiels. Posez une question aux cartes ou demandez simplement une guidance. Faites confiance a votre intuition - les reponses sont deja en vous.
tarot.kadim_note_content: Chaque carte de Tarot est un archetype de l'inconscient collectif. Comme l'a dit Jung, ces symboles sont nes des reves partages de l'humanite. Lorsque vous tirez une carte, vous entamez un dialogue avec l'univers. La reponse n'est pas dans la carte elle-meme, mais dans la connexion que vous etablissez avec elle.

yes_no_answers.positive_card_reversed: {card} est arriv√©e invers√©e. Bien que normalement positive, vous pourriez rencontrer des obstacles maintenant.
yes_no_answers.negative_card_reversed: {card} est en position invers√©e. Cela montre que les √©nergies n√©gatives dominent. Je recommande d'attendre.
yes_no_answers.transformation_card: {card} est une carte de transformation. Oui est possible, mais soyez pr√™t pour des changements inattendus.
yes_no_answers.positive_card: {card} porte une √©nergie positive. Le chemin semble d√©gag√©.
yes_no_answers.neutral_card: {card} est g√©n√©ralement un signe positif. Un optimisme prudent est appropri√©.

spread_labels.past_energy: Dans le passe, l'energie de {keyword} etait active.

fool.name: Le Mat
fool.upright: Vous etes au seuil d'un nouveau voyage. Laissez aller vos peurs et sautez dans l'inconnu. L'univers vous soutient.
fool.reversed: L'imprudence ou la peur vous retient. N'agissez pas sans reflechir, mais n'attendez pas trop longtemps non plus.
fool.advice: Ecoutez ce que votre coeur vous dit. Parfois la plus grande sagesse est d'accepter ce que vous ne savez pas.

magician.name: Le Magicien
magician.upright: Tous les outils sont entre vos mains. Vous avez le pouvoir de manifester ce que vous voulez. Clarifiez votre intention et agissez.
magician.reversed: Vous gaspillez peut-etre votre potentiel. Attention a la manipulation ou la tromperie.
magician.advice: Equilibrez les quatre elements - pensee, emotion, action et matiere. Utilisez votre pouvoir creatif consciemment.

high_priestess.name: La Papesse
high_priestess.upright: Faites confiance a votre intuition. Les reponses sont en vous. Il y a un grand pouvoir dans le silence et l'ecoute.
high_priestess.reversed: Vous reprimez peut-etre votre voix interieure. Des secrets ou des informations cachees peuvent faire surface.
high_priestess.advice: Temps pour la meditation et le voyage interieur. Faites attention a vos reves et intuitions.

empress.name: L'Imperatrice
empress.upright: L'energie d'abondance et de benediction est forte. Vous etes dans un cycle de creativite et de fertilite.
empress.reversed: Prenez soin de vous. Ne vous negligez pas en prenant soin des autres. Il peut y avoir des blocages creatifs.
empress.advice: Connectez-vous avec la nature. Appreciez la beaute. Montrez de la compassion pour vous et les autres.

emperor.name: L'Empereur
emperor.upright: Temps pour le leadership et la structure. La discipline et la determination apporteront le succes.
emperor.reversed: Controle excessif ou rigidite. La flexibilite est necessaire. Conflit avec les figures d'autorite.
emperor.advice: Fixez des limites fortes mais ne soyez pas dictateur. Prenez vos responsabilites, mais donnez aussi de l'espace aux autres.

hierophant.name: Le Hierophante
hierophant.upright: Les voies traditionnelles et les institutions sont importantes. Un enseignant ou guide peut apparaitre.
hierophant.reversed: Temps de questionner les traditions. Trouvez votre propre chemin spirituel. Eloignez-vous du dogmatisme.
hierophant.advice: La sagesse peut etre trouvee partout. Apprenez de la tradition mais cherchez aussi votre propre verite.

lovers.name: Les Amoureux
lovers.upright: Un choix ou union important. L'energie d'amour et d'harmonie est forte. Ecoutez votre coeur.
lovers.reversed: Disharmonie dans les relations. Un choix qui contredit vos valeurs. Conflit interieur.
lovers.advice: Le vrai amour commence par s'aimer soi-meme. Dans vos choix, ecoutez votre coeur et votre esprit.

chariot.name: Le Chariot
chariot.upright: La victoire est proche. Votre volonte et determination vous porteront vers votre but. Vous surmonterez les obstacles.
chariot.reversed: Perte de controle ou confusion de direction. Des forces opposees vous tirent.
chariot.advice: Concentrez-vous sur votre objectif. Equilibrez vos conflits interieurs. Perseverez sur le chemin de la victoire.

strength.name: La Force
strength.upright: La vraie force reside dans la compassion. Vous surmonterez les difficultes avec votre courage interieur.
strength.reversed: Manque de confiance en soi ou emotions reprimees. Redecouvrez votre force interieure.
strength.advice: Ne niez pas votre nature sauvage, aimez-la et apprivoisez-la. La douceur n'est pas une faiblesse.

hermit.name: L'Ermite
hermit.upright: Temps de vous tourner vers l'interieur et de contempler. Eloignez-vous des foules, trouvez votre propre lumiere.
hermit.reversed: Isolation excessive ou repli. Ou le contraire - fuite de la solitude.
hermit.advice: Il y a des reponses dans le silence. Soyez votre propre guide mais ne restez pas completement seul.

wheel_of_fortune.name: La Roue de Fortune
wheel_of_fortune.upright: De grands changements sont a venir. La chance tourne. La phase ascendante du cycle commence.
wheel_of_fortune.reversed: Malchance ou phase descendante du cycle. Cela aussi passera. Soyez patient.
wheel_of_fortune.advice: Les hauts et les bas de la vie sont naturels. Soyez reconnaissant au sommet, patient dans la chute.

justice.name: La Justice
justice.upright: La justice sera rendue. L'honnetete et la verite sont importantes. Le karma est a l'oeuvre.
justice.reversed: Injustice ou desequilibre. Eviter la responsabilite. Auto-tromperie.
justice.advice: Acceptez les consequences de vos actions. Soyez honnete - d'abord avec vous-meme.

hanged_man.name: Le Pendu
hanged_man.upright: Attendez et abandonnez-vous. Regardez sous un angle different. Un sacrifice peut etre necessaire.
hanged_man.reversed: Sacrifice inutile ou role de victime. Ou resistance a l'abandon.
hanged_man.advice: Parfois le chemin en avant est de s'arreter. Changez votre perspective, la reponse apparaitra.

death.name: La Mort
death.upright: Une grande transformation. La fin de quelque chose, le debut de quelque chose de nouveau. Resister prolonge la douleur.
death.reversed: Resistance au changement. Incapacite a lacher prise. Stagnation.
death.advice: La mort est la porte de la renaissance. Laissez aller l'ancien pour faire place au nouveau.

temperance.name: La Temperance
temperance.upright: Temps pour l'equilibre et l'harmonie. La patience et la moderation apportent le succes. L'energie de guerison est forte.
temperance.advice: Trouvez le juste milieu. En melangeant les opposes, atteignez la synthese doree.

devil.name: Le Diable
devil.upright: Vos addictions et peurs vous retiennent captif. Affrontez vos aspects sombres.
devil.reversed: Temps de briser les chaines. La liberation commence. Se liberer de l'addiction.
devil.advice: Vous avez mis les chaines, vous pouvez aussi les enlever. Dansez avec votre ombre, mais ne soyez pas son esclave.

tower.name: La Tour
tower.upright: Changement soudain et destructeur. Les fondations pourries s'effondrent. Mais c'est une purification.
tower.reversed: Catastrophe evitee ou resistance au changement. Destruction interieure.
tower.advice: Parfois tout doit s'effondrer pour que le vrai reste. Acceptez la tempete.

star.name: L'Etoile
star.upright: Temps pour l'espoir et l'inspiration. Guerison et renouveau. L'univers vous parle.
star.reversed: Desespoir ou perte de foi. Deconnexion de la connexion cosmique.
star.advice: Meme apres la nuit la plus sombre, les etoiles brillent. Ne perdez pas espoir.

moon.name: La Lune
moon.upright: Le subconscient fait surface. Affrontez les illusions et les peurs. Faites attention aux reves.
moon.reversed: Surmonter les peurs. S'eveiller des illusions. Clarte.
moon.advice: Les ombres ne sont pas reelles. Faites confiance a votre intuition en marchant dans l'obscurite.

sun.name: Le Soleil
sun.upright: Temps pour la lumiere, la joie et le succes. Tout est illumine. Celebration!
sun.reversed: Ombres temporaires ou succes retarde. Renouvelez la connexion avec votre enfant interieur.
sun.advice: N'ayez pas peur de laisser briller votre lumiere. Votre joie est contagieuse. Celebrez la vie!

judgement.name: Le Jugement
judgement.upright: Un grand eveil et appel. Bilan avec le passe. Renaissance.
judgement.reversed: Doute de soi ou etre coince dans le passe. Ne pas entendre l'appel.
judgement.advice: Acceptez votre passe, vivez votre present, creez votre futur. Repondez a votre appel.

world.name: Le Monde
world.upright: Le cycle s'acheve. Succes et integrite. Passage a un nouveau niveau.
world.reversed: Affaires inachevees ou cycles incomplets. Une etape de plus est necessaire.
world.advice: Chaque fin est un nouveau debut. Celebrez vos accomplissements et preparez-vous pour le prochain cycle.

chakra.title: Analyse des Chakras
chakra.energy_cycle_content: Les chakras ne sont pas seulement des centres energetiques, ce sont des portes de conscience. Chaque chakra est un pont entre le corps physique et le corps spirituel. Les equilibrer est la cle non seulement de la sante mais de l'eveil interieur.

root.description: Muladhara - "Support Racine" - symbolise par un lotus rouge a 4 petales. Situe a la base de la colonne vertebrale, ce chakra represente les instincts de survie, la securite, l'ancrage et votre connexion au monde materiel. Il est associe a l'element Terre. L'energie ancestrale y est stockee. Lorsqu'il est equilibre, vous vous sentez en securite et stable.
root.emotional_aspects: Sentiment de securite, stabilite, besoins fondamentaux
root.balance_high: Vous avez une base solide, vous vous sentez en securite.
root.balance_low: Vous avez besoin d'ancrage. Passez du temps dans la nature.
root.balance_mid: En equilibrage - renforcez avec une pratique reguliere.
healing_suggestions: Marchez pieds nus sur la terre
root.affirmation: Je suis en securite. L'univers me protege et me soutient.

sacral.description: Le chakra sacre est connecte a la creativite, aux emotions, a la sexualite et a la capacite de plaisir.
sacral.physical_connection: Organes reproducteurs, reins, bas du dos
sacral.balance_high: Votre energie creative circule, vous etes en paix avec vos emotions.
sacral.balance_low: Vous avez du mal a exprimer vos emotions.
sacral.balance_mid: Revitalisez cette energie avec des projets creatifs.
healing_suggestions: Dansez ou bougez votre corps librement
Connectez-vous a l'eau - nager, se baigner
sacral.affirmation: Mes emotions circulent librement. J'embrasse ma creativite.

solar_plexus.description: Le chakra du plexus solaire est lie au pouvoir personnel, a la confiance en soi, a la volonte et au sens de l'identite.
solar_plexus.emotional_aspects: Confiance en soi, pouvoir personnel, prise de decision
solar_plexus.balance_high: Vous avez une forte image de vous-meme.
solar_plexus.balance_low: Vous devez reconstruire votre confiance en vous.
solar_plexus.balance_mid: Renforcez-vous en vous concentrant sur vos objectifs.
healing_suggestions: Faites des exercices pour renforcer la region abdominale
solar_plexus.affirmation: Je suis puissant. J'ai le plein controle de ma vie.

heart.description: Anahata - "Son Non Frappe" - symbolise par un lotus vert a 12 petales. Le chakra du coeur est l'energie de l'amour, de la compassion, du pardon et de l'acceptation inconditionnelle. C'est le pont reliant le corps physique et spirituel. Il est connecte a l'element Air. Lorsqu'il est equilibre, vous experimentez l'amour universel et la compassion pour tous les etres.
heart.balance_high: Votre coeur est plein d'amour, vous etes harmonieux dans vos relations.
heart.balance_low: Montrez de la compassion a vous-meme et aux autres.
heart.balance_mid: Ouvrez votre coeur avec des pratiques de pardon.
healing_suggestions: Passez du temps de qualite avec vos proches
heart.affirmation: Mon coeur est plein d'amour. Je suis ouvert a donner et recevoir.

throat.description: Le chakra de la gorge est lie a la communication, a l'expression de soi, a la verite et a la voix creative.
throat.balance_low: Vous avez du mal a vous faire entendre.
throat.balance_mid: Renforcez-vous avec des pratiques d'ecriture quotidiennes.
throat.affirmation: Ma voix a de la valeur. Je partage ma verite avec amour.

third_eye.description: Le chakra du troisieme oeil est connecte a l'intuition, a la vision interieure, a l'imagination et a la conscience spirituelle.
third_eye.balance_high: Votre intuition est forte, vous etes en harmonie avec votre voix interieure.
third_eye.balance_mid: Developpez votre perspicacite avec la meditation.
third_eye.affirmation: Je fais confiance a mon intuition. Ma sagesse interieure me guide.

crown.description: Le chakra couronne est lie a la connexion spirituelle, a l'illumination, a la conscience universelle et au but de vie.
crown.emotional_aspects: Connexion spirituelle, quete de sens, unite
crown.balance_high: Vous avez une connexion profonde avec l'univers.
crown.balance_low: Renforcez votre connexion avec des pratiques spirituelles.
crown.balance_mid: Ouvrez-vous avec le silence et la meditation.
healing_suggestions: Pratiquez la meditation de pleine conscience
crown.affirmation: Je suis un avec l'univers. Je suis ouvert a la guidance divine.

chakra.overall_analysis:
En tant que {sign}, votre systeme energetique est particulierement fort dans la zone {strongest}. Cela signifie que vous avez un talent naturel pour les questions de {emotional_aspects}.

Cependant, accorder plus d'attention a votre zone {weakest} serait benefique. Vous pouvez ajouter les pratiques recommandees pour ce chakra a votre routine quotidienne.

Dans l'ensemble, votre systeme de chakras fonctionne harmonieusement. Vous pouvez maintenir cet equilibre avec une meditation reguliere et des pratiques de pleine conscience.
general_tips_list: Meditez au moins 10 minutes chaque jour
Ancrez-vous en passant du temps dans la nature
Ecrivez vos emotions dans un journal

meditation_descriptions.grounding: Imaginez des racines s'etendant de vos pieds dans la terre. Ressentez securite et stabilite.
meditation_descriptions.heart_opening: Imaginez une lumiere verte dans votre coeur. A chaque respiration, laissez cette lumiere grandir.
meditation_descriptions.third_eye_activation: Concentrez-vous sur le point entre vos sourcils. Imaginez que vous pouvez voir une lumiere violette.

chakra.daily_description: Aujourd'hui, l'energie {chakra} est proeminente. Vous pouvez rendre votre journee plus productive en faisant des activites alignees avec cette energie.
chakra.daily_reason: Ce jour de la semaine correspond a l'energie {chakra}.

daily_activities.meditation_5min: Faites une meditation de 5 minutes pour {chakra}
daily_activities.affirmation_3x: Repetez l'affirmation 3 fois pendant la journee

aura.title: Analyse de l'Aura
aura.energy_body_description: L'aura est le champ energetique qui entoure votre corps physique. Chaque pensee, emotion et experience affecte la couleur et l'intensite de votre aura. Votre date de naissance et votre nom determinent votre couleur d'aura principale - c'est votre signature spirituelle. Comprendre votre aura est la cle pour gerer et proteger votre energie.
aura.chakra_balance_info: Les chakras sont les centres energetiques de votre corps. Chacun gouverne differents domaines de la vie.
aura.energy_body_secret: Le Secret de Votre Corps Energetique
aura.energy_body_secret_content: Le concept d'aura est base sur des milliers d'annees de tradition esoterique. Connu comme 'ka' dans l'Egypte ancienne, ce corps energetique est appele 'prana maya kosha' (enveloppe d'energie vitale) dans la tradition indienne. La photographie Kirlian moderne a confirme cette sagesse ancienne, rendant visible le champ bioelectrique autour des organismes vivants.
aura.chakra_advice_root: Promenez-vous dans la nature, portez du rouge. Meditations d'ancrage et exercices physiques renforcent ce chakra.
aura.chakra_advice_sacral: Faites des activites creatives, dansez. Mangez des aliments oranges et restez pres de l'element eau.
aura.chakra_advice_solar: Passez du temps au soleil. Faites des exercices de respiration et dites-vous des affirmations positives.
aura.chakra_advice_heart: Passez du temps avec vos proches. Tenez un journal de gratitude et passez du temps dans des espaces verts.
aura.chakra_advice_throat: Exprimez vos sentiments, chantez. Portez des tons bleus et buvez beaucoup d'eau.
aura.chakra_advice_third_eye: Meditez et notez vos reves. Concentrez-vous sur les couleurs violettes/indigo.
aura.chakra_advice_crown: Passez du temps dans le silence, meditez. Portez du blanc ou du violet et connectez-vous avec la nature.

spiritual_advice.red: Ancrez votre energie. L'activite physique et les promenades dans la nature equilibreront votre aura.
spiritual_advice.orange: Exprimez votre creativite. L'art, la danse ou la musique renforceront votre aura.
spiritual_advice.yellow: Gardez votre clarte mentale. Apprendre et enseigner poliront votre aura.
spiritual_advice.green: Ouvrez votre coeur. Le travail de guerison et l'aide aux autres feront grandir votre aura.
spiritual_advice.blue: Dites votre verite. La communication honnete et l'expression authentique renforceront votre aura.
spiritual_advice.indigo: Faites confiance a votre intuition. La meditation et le travail sur les reves approfondiront votre aura.
spiritual_advice.violet: Renforcez votre connexion cosmique. Les pratiques spirituelles et le service eleveront votre aura.
spiritual_advice.pink: Repandez l'amour inconditionnel. La compassion et l'empathie etendront votre aura.
spiritual_advice.white: Maintenez votre purete. Les rituels de purification et la meditation protegeront votre aura.
spiritual_advice.gold: Souvenez-vous de votre connexion divine. La priere et la gratitude poliront votre aura.

affirmations.red: Je suis fort et en securite. J'avance sans peur.
affirmations.orange: Ma creativite est illimitee. Je m'exprime avec joie.
affirmations.yellow: Mon esprit est clair, ma volonte est forte. Le succes est mien.
affirmations.green: Mon coeur est ouvert, mon amour est infini. Je porte la guerison.
affirmations.blue: Je dis ma verite. Ma voix est puissante.
affirmations.indigo: Je fais confiance a mon intuition. Ma sagesse interieure me guide.
affirmations.violet: Je suis un avec l'univers. Je sers mon but superieur.
affirmations.pink: Je donne de l'amour, je recois de l'amour. La compassion est ma nature.
affirmations.white: Je suis dans la lumiere pure. La protection divine est avec moi.
affirmations.gold: Je suis energie divine. L'abondance et la prosperite coulent avec moi.

daily_guidance.strongest: Aujourd'hui votre aura est a son plus fort. Jour ideal pour utiliser vos talents naturels.
daily_guidance.harmonious: L'energie d'aujourd'hui est harmonieuse avec votre aura. Restez dans le flux et saisissez les opportunites.
daily_guidance.different: Aujourd'hui a un flux d'energie different. Flexibilite et adaptation sont importants. Trouvez l'equilibre.

cleansing_tips.meditation_desc: Meditez sur {focus} pendant 10-15 minutes par jour pour renforcer votre aura {color}.
cleansing_tips.crystal_desc: Le cristal {crystal} est ideal pour equilibrer votre aura.

cleansing_tips.sound_desc: Ecoutez de la musique a la frequence {frequency} Hz ou chantez le mantra {mantra}.

nature.red: Marchez pieds nus sur la terre. Enlacez les arbres.
nature.orange: Regardez le coucher de soleil. Passez du temps pres de l'eau.
nature.yellow: Prenez des bains de soleil. Soyez dans les jardins fleuris.
nature.green: Promenez-vous en foret. Prenez soin des plantes.
nature.blue: Soyez pres de la mer ou d'un lac. Regardez le ciel.
nature.indigo: Observez le ciel nocturne et les etoiles.
nature.violet: Soyez en montagne ou en altitude.
nature.pink: Passez du temps dans les jardins fleuris.
nature.white: Observez la neige ou les nuages. Soyez au grand air.
nature.gold: Regardez le lever du soleil. Soyez dans la lumiere du soleil.

kabbalah.title: Kabbale
kabbalah.tree_of_life_secret: Le Secret de l'Arbre de Vie
kabbalah.tree_of_life_intro: La Kabbale est un ancien systeme de sagesse qui explique la structure de l'univers et de l'ame. L'Arbre de Vie (Etz Chaim) se compose de dix Sefirot - chacun representant un aspect different de l'energie divine. Votre nom et votre date de naissance determinent votre place sur cet arbre cosmique. Cette connaissance vous guidera dans votre voyage spirituel.
kabbalah.life_path_sefirah: Votre Sefirah de Chemin de Vie
kabbalah.your_place_on_tree: Votre Place sur l'Arbre de Vie
kabbalah.marked_red: Marque en rouge: Votre Sefirah de Chemin de Vie
kabbalah.marked_blue: Marque en bleu: Votre Sefirah du Nom

interpretation.name_intro: "{name}" porte l'energie de {sefirah} avec la valeur de Gematria {gematria}.
interpretation.sefirah_keter: Votre ame est connectee a l'infini - vous etes ne porteur de la volonte divine. Votre intuition est forte, votre vision est vaste.
interpretation.sefirah_chokhmah: Vous portez les graines de la sagesse - les intuitions soudaines et les inspirations sont naturelles pour vous. Une ame visionnaire.
interpretation.sefirah_binah: Vous avez une capacite de comprehension profonde - vous traitez les concepts en profondeur et leur donnez forme. Analytique et intuitif.
interpretation.sefirah_chesed: La compassion et l'amour sont votre nature - vous portez une energie guerissante et nourrissante. La generosite est dans votre esprit.
interpretation.sefirah_gevurah: Votre force interieure est puissante - la discipline et la determination sont vos armes. Votre sens de la justice est aiguise.
interpretation.sefirah_tiferet: Vous etes au point d'equilibre - vous creez naturellement la beaute et l'harmonie. Centre sur le coeur.
interpretation.sefirah_netzach: La perseverance et la passion sont votre chemin - votre energie creative est inepuisable. Vous ne vous arreterez pas tant que vous n'aurez pas atteint vos objectifs.
interpretation.sefirah_hod: Vos capacites de communication et d'analyse sont fortes - vous exprimez vos pensees clairement. Brillance mentale.
interpretation.sefirah_yesod: Vous avez une profondeur intuitive - les reves et les symboles vous parlent. Votre connexion astrale est forte.
interpretation.sefirah_malkut: Vous etes ancre et pratique - vous avez la capacite de transformer les idees en realite. Le monde est votre royaume.
interpretation.balance_harmony: Votre monde interieur et votre projection exterieure sont en harmonie - une personnalite authentique.
interpretation.balance_dynamic: Il y a une dynamique interessante entre vos mondes interieur et exterieur - cette tension porte un potentiel de croissance.
interpretation.balance_mystery: Votre monde interieur profond et le visage que vous montrez sont differents - ce mystere vous rend puissant.

tree_interpretation.middle_pillar: Vous etes sur le Pilier du Milieu dans l'Arbre de Vie. Le pilier du milieu est le chemin de l'equilibre - votre tache est d'unir les opposes et de creer l'harmonie.
tree_interpretation.right_pillar: Vous etes sur le Pilier de Droite dans l'Arbre de Vie. Le pilier de droite est le chemin de la misericorde et de l'expansion - l'amour, la generosite et la creativite sont votre domaine.
tree_interpretation.left_pillar: Vous etes sur le Pilier de Gauche dans l'Arbre de Vie. Le pilier de gauche est le chemin de la forme et de la discipline - fixer des limites, l'analyse et le pouvoir sont votre domaine.
tree_interpretation.same_sefirah: Votre nom et date de naissance pointent vers la meme Sefirah - vous etes tres puissant dans cette energie!
tree_interpretation.full_journey: Le voyage entre {lifePath} et {namePath} englobe tout l'Arbre de Vie - vous vivez une profonde evolution spirituelle.
tree_interpretation.unique_signature: {lifePath} est votre energie de naissance, {namePath} est la vibration qui vient avec votre nom - ces deux ensemble creent une signature spirituelle unique.
tree_interpretation.single_sefirah: L'energie de {lifePath} represente la lecon principale que vous devez apprendre dans cette vie.

meditations.loving_kindness_desc: Open your heart center by sending compassion to yourself and others.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.zodiac_subtitle: Most frequently asked questions and answers
faq.birth_chart_subtitle: Everything you wonder about natal charts
faq.tarot_subtitle: What you need to know about tarot cards
faq.zodiac_a1: {sign} is one of the zodiac signs. Each sign has unique personality traits, strengths and weaknesses. Even if your Sun sign is {sign}, your rising sign and Moon sign also significantly influence your personality.
faq.zodiac_a2: Sign compatibility depends on the entire birth chart, not just Sun signs. Generally, signs in the same element group (fire, earth, air, water) tend to be more compatible. For detailed compatibility analysis, synastry (comparative chart) analysis is recommended.
faq.zodiac_a3: Daily horoscopes reflect general cosmic energies. Since each individual's birth chart is unique, personalized readings through birth chart analysis and transit reports provide more accurate results.
faq.zodiac_q4: What does it mean if my rising sign is {sign}?
faq.zodiac_a4: The rising sign (Ascendant) is the sign that was rising on the eastern horizon at your birth moment. It represents your outer appearance, how others perceive you, and your approach to life. You need to know your birth time to find your rising sign.
faq.birth_chart_a1: A birth chart (natal chart) is a cosmic map showing the positions of planets in the sky at the moment you were born. It shows which signs and houses the Sun, Moon and planets were in, and the aspects they make to each other.
faq.birth_chart_q2: What do I need to calculate a birth chart?
faq.birth_chart_a2: To calculate a birth chart, you need your birth date, birth time, and birth place. The more precise your birth time, the more accurately your rising sign and house placements can be calculated.
faq.birth_chart_q3: What if I don't know my birth time?
faq.birth_chart_a3: When birth time is unknown, noon (12:00) is typically used. In this case, the Moon sign and rising sign may be inaccurate. Planet sign placements and aspects between them will still be accurate.
faq.birth_chart_q4: What is the difference between house systems (Placidus, Whole Sign)?
faq.birth_chart_a4: Different house systems use different mathematical methods to divide the sky into 12 houses. Placidus is the most commonly used system. Whole Sign is an ancient system where each sign represents one house. Both systems are valid.
faq.tarot_q1: Do tarot cards show the future?
faq.tarot_a1: Tarot cards don't show a definite future, but rather your current energy field and possibilities. The cards work like a mirror - reflecting your subconscious and situation. The future is shaped by your decisions and actions.
faq.tarot_q2: How many cards are in a tarot deck?
faq.tarot_a2: A standard tarot deck consists of 78 cards: 22 Major Arcana (great secrets) and 56 Minor Arcana (lesser secrets). The Minor Arcana has four suits (Wands, Cups, Swords, Pentacles) with 14 cards each.
faq.tarot_a3: Reversed cards can indicate that the card's energy is blocked, internalized, or excessive. Some tarot readers don't use reversed cards, while others consider them an important nuance.
faq.tarot_q4: Can I read tarot for myself?
faq.tarot_a4: Yes, you can read tarot for yourself. The important thing is to set a clear intention and interpret the cards objectively. Daily card pulls are an excellent practice for self-discovery.
faq.numerology_a1: Numerology is an ancient wisdom system that studies the symbolic and spiritual meanings of numbers. It is believed that the numbers in your birth date and name provide information about your life path, personality, and potential.
faq.numerology_q2: How is the life path number calculated?
faq.numerology_a2: Your life path number is found by reducing all digits in your birth date to a single digit (or master numbers like 11, 22, 33). Example: 15.05.1990 = 1+5+0+5+1+9+9+0 = 30 = 3+0 = 3
faq.numerology_a3: Master numbers are powerful vibrations that carry special potential and challenges. 11 represents intuitive enlightenment, 22 the master builder, and 33 the master teacher. These numbers are not reduced to single digits.
faq.numerology_a4: Each letter has a numerical value (in the Pythagorean or Chaldean system). By adding up the numerical values of the letters in your name, your expression number, soul number, and personality number are calculated.

rising_sign.title: What is rising sign?
short_answer_bullets: Rising sign is the zodiac sign that was rising on the eastern horizon at the moment of birth.
It determines how the outside world sees you.
It is different from your Sun sign and requires birth time to calculate.
what_it_tells_bullets: Your first impression: What people feel when they first see you.
Your physical appearance: Affects facial features and body structure.
Your defense mechanism: How you behave in new situations.
Your approach to life: How you interact with the world.
difference_from_sun_bullets: Sun sign: Your essence, who you are.
Rising sign: Your mask, how you appear.
Moon sign: Your emotions, what you feel.
how_calculated_bullets: Rising sign changes approximately every 2 hours.
Cannot be calculated if birth time is unknown.
why_important_bullets: It determines all houses in the chart.
It affects which houses the planets fall into.
It positions life areas from career to relationships.

moon_sign_today.title: What sign is the Moon in today?
short_answer_bullets: The Moon changes signs approximately every 2.5 days.
Whatever sign the Moon is in today shapes your emotions.
The Moon sign determines the daily emotional tone.
why_important_bullets: Shapes your needs for nourishment and rest.
daily_life_bullets: When Moon is in a fire sign: Energy rises, impatience may occur.
When Moon is in an earth sign: Good for practical matters.
When Moon is in an air sign: Communication and socializing are highlighted.
When Moon is in a water sign: Emotional depth increases.

saturn_return.title: Saturn Return
saturn_return.subtitle: The Great Teacher's Cosmic Lessons
saturn_return.kadim_content: Saturn, known as the Lord of Karma in astrology, demands discipline, responsibility, and maturity with each return. Approximately every 29.5 years, this cosmic teacher tests your foundations, destroys structures that don't serve your authentic self, and guides you toward building lasting achievements. The challenges are real, but so are the rewards for those who do the inner work.
saturn_return.in_return: You are in your Saturn Return

info.wisdom_quote: Saturn is the cosmic teacher. During its returns, it confronts us with our limits, responsibilities, and true selves.

active_messages.first: In this transition to adulthood, you are defining your career and life direction. This period may be challenging but will strengthen you.
active_messages.second: Transition to the second half of life. Your true priorities are becoming clearer, combining wisdom with experience.
active_messages.third: Time to review your legacy and life purpose. You are passing your wisdom to future generations.
active_messages.default: You are in an important life transformation.

interpretations.first: The First Saturn Return (ages 27-30) is the gateway to adulthood. During this time, you balance youthful dreams with reality. Important decisions about career, relationships, and life purpose are made. Saturn confronts you with your limits and helps you reveal your true potential.
interpretations.second: The Second Saturn Return (ages 57-60) is the transition to life's second half. During this time, you understand what truly matters. There is a shift from career peak to sharing wisdom. Physical and emotional health come to the fore.
interpretations.third: The Third Saturn Return (ages 87-90) is the time to evaluate your life legacy. Your wisdom and experiences are passed on to future generations. Spiritual maturity and inner peace are the gifts of this period.

theta_healing.title: Theta Healing
theta_healing.subtitle: Subconscious Transformation Practice
theta_healing.intro_description: Theta Healing is a healing technique aimed at transforming subconscious beliefs and energy blocks in the theta brain wave state (4-7 Hz). This practice helps you discover limiting beliefs and create positive changes.

intro.theta_state_content: Theta brain waves (4-7 Hz) are active during deep meditation, dreaming, and moments of creativity. In this state, direct access to the subconscious is possible and profound changes can be made.
intro.limiting_beliefs_content: There are belief patterns formed in childhood that unconsciously affect our lives. With Theta Healing, you can identify and transform these beliefs.
intro.energy_transformation_content: Energy blocks at the physical, mental, and spiritual levels are resolved. The healing process begins at the cellular level and spreads throughout your entire being.
intro.seven_planes_content: Theta Healing works with the 7 planes of existence in the universe: Minerals, Plants, Animals, Humans, Spirits, Laws, and Creative Energy.

techniques.digging_description: You go deep into the subconscious to find the root cause of the limiting belief and discover the core belief.
techniques.digging_step_2: Go deeper with the question "Where does this belief come from?"
techniques.digging_step_4: Transform when you find the root belief
techniques.belief_change_description: The process of replacing a negative belief with a positive one.
techniques.belief_change_step_4: Ask the Creator for the change and witness it
techniques.feeling_download_description: A technique for teaching positive feelings you have never experienced at the cellular level.
techniques.feeling_download_step_1: Identify the missing feeling (e.g., feeling safe)
techniques.feeling_download_step_3: Ask what it feels like to know this feeling
techniques.feeling_download_step_4: Download the feeling into every cell
techniques.body_scan_description: Detecting energy blocks and sources of illness in your body.
techniques.body_scan_step_2: Scan the body from head to toe
techniques.body_scan_step_3: Note areas of energy density or deficiency

meditations.theta_transition_description: Safely transition to the theta brain wave state.
meditations.seventh_plane_description: Connect to creative energy and experience unconditional love.
meditations.inner_child_description: Heal childhood traumas with compassion and make peace with your inner child.
meditations.ancestor_clearing_description: Clear karmic patterns and genetic beliefs inherited from ancestors.
meditations.abundance_description: Remove abundance blocks and open the flow of prosperity.
meditations.soulmate_description: Clear relationship obstacles and attract your soulmate.

chart.cosmic_map_description: This chart is a snapshot of the sky at the moment you were born ‚Äî but it's so much more. It's a coded map of the potentials, lessons, and gifts your soul brought into this world. Each planet is an inner voice, each sign an energy pattern, each house a life domain. This chart doesn't limit you ‚Äî it reminds you of who you are.

synastry.title: Synastry
synastry.kadim_content: In the dance of two souls, the stars reveal not just compatibility, but the deeper lessons each person brings to the other. Synastry is the ancient art of reading these cosmic conversations.

insights.daily_energy_content: The Moon's current position brings emotional depth. It's the perfect time to listen to your inner voice.
insights.transit_effect_content: Venus movements are highlighting your relationships and values.
insights.dream_guide_content: Dreams you have tonight may carry important messages. Don't forget to record your dreams.
insights.weekly_preview_content: Cosmic energies are working in your favor for the rest of the week.

numerology.life_areas_impact: Impact sur les Domaines de Vie
numerology.famous_people: Famous People with This Life Path
numerology.master_tip_11: As a Master 11, practice regular meditation and grounding to protect your high intuition and sensitivity. Protect yourself from energy vampires.
numerology.master_tip_22: As a Master 22, build your big visions step by step. Perfectionism can paralyze - embrace the principle that 'done is better than perfect'.
numerology.master_tip_33: As a Master 33, don't neglect yourself while healing others. Boundaries are not unkind - put on your own mask first.
numerology.shadow_transforms: Shadow transforms with awareness. Acceptance is integration.

numerology.life_path_bullets_6_2: Caring for family and community comes naturally.
numerology.life_path_bullets_6_3: Creating harmony and beauty is life purpose.

numerology.life_path_bullets_7_2: Spiritual seeking and analysis are natural tendencies.

daily_number.short_answer_3: Reflects the overall energy and potential of the day.

daily_number.what_for_1: Helps you align with the energy of the day.

destiny_number_screen.difference_from_life_path_2: Destiny number: The destination you want to reach.
destiny_number_screen.difference_from_life_path_3: Together they form the complete picture.

timing.title: Cosmic Timing
timing.subtitle: Discover the best times for your activities
timing.kadim_content: Ancient civilizations knew the importance of timing. Each hour of the day is ruled by a different planet. By aligning your activities with cosmic rhythms, you can maximize your potential.
timing.score_good: Good energy, stay aware of conditions
timing.score_challenging: Challenging day, focus on routine tasks
timing.mercury_retro_desc: Review communication and technology. Delay signing new contracts.
timing.clear_sky_desc: No major astrological warnings active. Good day for initiatives.
timing.biorhythm_high: Energy is high across all cycles. Great day for challenging activities.
timing.biorhythm_balanced: Balanced energy day. Good for varied activities.
timing.biorhythm_low: Some cycles are low. Rest and conserve energy when needed.
timing.biorhythm_critical: Critical phase in some cycles. Take care and avoid overexertion.
timing.aspect_sun_harmonious: Vitality and confidence are enhanced. Great for leadership and creative expression.
timing.aspect_moon_harmonious: Emotional harmony flows. Good for nurturing and connecting with loved ones.
timing.aspect_venus_harmonious: Love and beauty are highlighted. Ideal for relationships and artistic pursuits.
timing.aspect_jupiter_harmonious: Luck and expansion favor you. Good for taking calculated risks.
timing.aspect_default_harmonious: Positive energy supports your endeavors today.

timing.aspect_saturn_challenging: May feel restrictions or delays. Practice patience and persistence.
timing.aspect_pluto_challenging: Deep transformation underway. Face shadows with courage.
timing.aspect_default_challenging: Navigate challenges with awareness and flexibility.

timing.rec_love_desc_venus_retro: Venus retrograde brings thoughts of past loves. Wait for new beginnings.
timing.rec_love_desc_libra: Relationship energy is high. Ideal time for harmony and romance with partner.
timing.rec_love_desc_taurus: Physical closeness and security matter. Good for intimate moments.

timing.rec_love_desc_scorpio: Passionate and intense emotions prevail. Be bold in forming deep connections.
timing.rec_love_desc_default: New opportunities in love may arise. Stay open.
timing.rec_career_desc_voc: Important business decisions should be postponed. Continue existing projects.
timing.rec_career_desc_mercury_retro: Watch for communication errors. Review contracts carefully.
timing.rec_career_desc_capricorn: Career goals become clear. Ideal for long-term planning.
timing.rec_career_desc_virgo: Focus on details. Analysis and organization work is supported.
timing.rec_career_desc_aries: Leadership energy is high. Dare to start new projects.
timing.rec_career_desc_default: Stable day at work. Stick to routines.
